name: Net WebClient Casing Anomalies
description: Detects PowerShell command line contents that include a suspicious abnormal casing in the Net.Webclient (e.g. nEt.WEbCliEnT) string as used in obfuscation techniques
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Tt][Gg][Bb][Ll][Aa][Ff][Qq][Aa][Ll][Gg][Bb]3[Aa][Ee][Uu][Aa][Qq][Gg].*/ OR /.*4[Aa][Zz][Qq][Bb][Uu][Aa][Cc]4[Aa][Dd][Ww][Bb][Ff][Aa][Ee][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Vv][Aa][Aa][Uu][Aa][Hh][Cc][Aa][Rr][Qq][Bb][Cc][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Bb][Gg][Bb][Ff][Aa][Hh][Qq][Aa][Ll][Gg][Bb]3[Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Yy][Gg].*/ OR /.*4[Aa][Rr][Qq][Bb]0[Aa][Cc]4[Aa][Dd][Ww][Bb][Ll][Aa][Gg][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Aa][Ee][Uu][Aa][Dd][Aa][Aa][Uu][Aa][Hh][Cc][Aa][Zz][Qq][Bb][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Gg][Bb][Ff][Aa][Hh][Qq][Aa][Ll][Gg][Bb]3[Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Yy][Gg].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Ee][Uu][Aa][Dd][Aa][Aa][Uu][Aa][Hh][Cc][Aa][Zz][Qq][Bb][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Bb][Gg][Bb][Ll][Aa][Ff][Qq][Aa][Ll][Gg][Bb]3[Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Yy][Gg].*/ OR /.*4[Aa][Zz][Qq][Bb][Uu][Aa][Cc]4[Aa][Dd][Ww][Bb][Ll][Aa][Gg][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Vv][Aa][Aa][Uu][Aa][Hh][Cc][Aa][Zz][Qq][Bb][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Gg][Bb][Ll][Aa][Ff][Qq][Aa][Ll][Gg][Bb]3[Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Yy][Gg].*/ OR /.*[Oo][Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Vv][Aa][Aa][Uu][Aa][Hh][Cc][Aa][Zz][Qq][Bb][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Bb][Gg][Bb][Ff][Aa][Ff][Qq][Aa][Ll][Gg][Bb]3[Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Yy][Gg].*/ OR /.*4[Aa][Rr][Qq][Bb][Uu][Aa][Cc]4[Aa][Dd][Ww][Bb][Ll][Aa][Gg][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Aa][Ee][Uu][Aa][Vv][Aa][Aa][Uu][Aa][Hh][Cc][Aa][Zz][Qq][Bb][Ii][Aa].*/ OR /.*[Bb][Gg][Bb][Ll][Aa][Hh][Qq][Aa][Ll][Gg][Bb][Xx][Aa][Gg][Uu][Aa][Yy][Gg].*/ OR /.*4[Aa][Zz][Qq][Bb]0[Aa][Cc]4[Aa][Vv][Ww][Bb][Ll][Aa][Gg][Ii][Aa].*/ OR
